message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at a steal - just $12,000.  I know it's valuable to you and this is a great price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but  $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800? I'm really interested in the product and don't want to walk away, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
